text: Much Ado About Nothing () is a 1973 Soviet comedy movie directed by Samson Samsonov.Биография Константина РайкинаМНОГО ШУМА ИЗ НИЧЕГО (1973) It stars Galina Jovovich, Konstantin Raikin, and Tatyana Vedeneyeva. The movie is based on William Shakespeare's play of the same name. ==Actors== *Galina Jovovich - Beatrice *Konstantin Raikin - Benedicto *Tatyana Vedeneyeva - Gero *Leonid Trushkin - Claudio *Boris Ivanov - Leonato *Alexei Samoilov - Prince *Vladimir Korenev - Juan *Alexei Dobronravov - Antonio *Erast Garin - Kissel *Pavel Pavlenko - Dogberry == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1973 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Samson Samsonov
title: Much Ado About Nothing (1973 movie)
